results.title: Effects of third-generation beta-blockers, atenolol or amlodipine on blood pressure variability and target organ damage in spontaneously hypertensive rats.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Carvedilol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077261 @@@Carvedilol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Nebivolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068577 @@@nebivolol@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ were more effective than @CHEMICAL_Atenolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ in the prevention of @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@, and cardiac @DISEASE_Collagen_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D003095 @@@and aortic collagen deposit@@@.

results.title: Cardiac hypertrophy during hypercholesterolemia and its amelioration with rosuvastatin and amlodipine.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@Cardiac hypertrophy@@@ during @DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@ and its amelioration with @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@.

results.title: The effect of amlodipine on hypertension-induced cardiac hypertrophy and reperfusion-induced calcium overload.
results.text_hl: The effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ on @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@ and reperfusion-induced @DISEASE_Iron_Overload @DISEASE_MESH:D019190 @@@calcium overload@@@.

results.title: Additive beneficial effects of amlodipine and atorvastatin in reversing advanced cardiac hypertrophy in elderly spontaneously hypertensive rats.
results.text_hl: In conclusion, combined @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ treatment has a greater beneficial effect on advanced @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@ compared with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ monotherapy.

citations.NLM: Lu JC, Cui W, Zhang HL, Liu F, Han M, Liu DM, Yin HN, Zhang K, Du J. Additive beneficial effects of amlodipine and atorvastatin in reversing advanced cardiac hypertrophy in elderly spontaneously hypertensive rats. Clin Exp Pharmacol Physiol. 2009 Nov;36(11):1110-9. PMID: 19413592

results.title: Enhancement of cardiac oxidative stress by tachycardia and its critical role in cardiac hypertrophy and fibrosis.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: @CHEMICAL_azelnidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C061679 @@@Azelnidipine@@@ suppressed @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@, @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@, NADPH oxidase and @CHEMICAL_Superoxides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013481 @@@superoxide@@@ in spSHRs more potently than @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, and was associated with lower heart rates than @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@.

citations.NLM: Yamamoto E, Lai ZF, Yamashita T, Tanaka T, Kataoka K, Tokutomi Y, Ito T, Ogawa H, Kim-Mitsuyama S. Enhancement of cardiac oxidative stress by tachycardia and its critical role in cardiac hypertrophy and fibrosis. J Hypertens. 2006 Oct;24(10):2057-69. PMID: 16957567

results.title: Amlodipine decreases fibrosis and cardiac hypertrophy in spontaneously hypertensive rats: persistent effects after withdrawal.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ decreases @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@ in spontaneously @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@: persistent effects after withdrawal.

results.title: Amlodipine: a once daily calcium antagonist.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ has also been shown to attenuate the @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@ associated with the development of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ in spontaneously @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: Amlodipine ameliorates myocardial hypertrophy by inhibiting EGFR phosphorylation.
results.text_hl: In this study, we investigated whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ attenuates @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@ by inhibiting @GENE_EGFR @GENE_24329 @@@EGFR@@@ phosphorylation.

results.title: Vascular and myocardial effects of amlodipine: an overview.
results.text_hl: In spontaneously @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ (5 mg/kg/day) caused a fall in systolic blood pressure, accompanied by a significant (P less than 0.01) reduction in @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@.

citations.NLM: Nayler WG, Gu XH. Vascular and myocardial effects of amlodipine: an overview. Postgrad Med J. 1991;67 Suppl 5():S41-3. PMID: 1839439

results.title: Cardioprotective effects of an angiotensin-converting-enzyme inhibitor, imidapril, and Ca2+ channel antagonist, amlodipine, in spontaneously hypertensive rats at established stage of hypertension.
results.text_hl: The present results suggest that @CHEMICAL_imidapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:C065166 @@@imidapril@@@ possesses advantageous effects to prevent @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@ and @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@deteriorated cardiac function@@@ in SHRs of established stage of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ as compared with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@.
